attributes.action: Make our country  a proud example.!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bring our troops home, and acknowledge that war with Iraq has been a shambolic disaster,causing nothing but heartache and misery to those it  professed to help, along with the families of British military personel,both fatally and seriously injured.Concentrate resources on sorting out the numerous problems of our OWN rapidly declining UK. Issues such as Immigration( and the control of our borders),farcical prison sentences,benefit fraud,Political Correctness gone mad,NHS falling apart,education and discipline in schools,drug and alcohol abuse,..the list is never ending! Let us have a country to display as a proud EXAMPLE....BEFORE we try to influence or interfere with how other Nations live theirs !!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
